content: अक्षेत्र {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [न. ब.] Destitute of fields; uncultivated. --त्रं {@--1@} A bad field (अप्रशस्तं क्षेत्रं); अक्षेत्रे बीजमुत्सृष्टमंतरैव विनश्यति <ls>Ms. 10. 71.</ls> {@--2@} Not a good geometrical figure. {@--3@} (<ab>fig.</ab>) A bad pupil, unworthy recipient or receptacle (of any thing).
